longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required.

Minors:
- Foreign minors up to 18 years old 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay.
Warning:
- Nationals of Uzbekistan are required to hold a biometric
  passport when departing Uzbekistan
